rows.label: qst610501_msg0001
rows.name:
Ach, this is a proper
mess... What are we going
to do with that soldier?

rows.label: qst610501_msg0002
rows.name:
Gives me a proper headache, it
does... I'm feeling queasy...

rows.label: qst610501_msg0003
rows.name:
What I wouldn't give for a little
help from the Special Inquisitor...
先頭キャラがメレフ

rows.label: qst610501_msg0101
rows.name:
Ah! Special Inquisitor Meleph! If you'd
be so kind, there's a small matter on
which I'd like to consult with you...

rows.label: qst610501_msg0102
rows.name: And what might that be, Captain?

rows.label: qst610501_msg0103
rows.name:
Well, there's a man in the unit that I
command - the 12th Company - who's
risking his life to defend Alba Margen.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0104
rows.name: How very patriotic of him.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0105
rows.name: But as I recall...

rows.label: qst610501_msg0106
rows.name:
That's right, ma'am. My company isn't
assigned to defend the capital.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0107
rows.name:
We're meant to be stationed
in Temperantia, guarding the
Divine Beast weapons.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0108
rows.name:
But Ishaq won't listen to me, ma'am.
Won't move an inch from Bathein
Watchtower. Calls it his duty.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0109
rows.name:
What's worse is, he's damn good at
guarding the place. Even we can't get
close to talk some sense into him.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0110
rows.name:
So I was wondering if you mightn't be
able to go see him, ma'am. If anyone can
get through to him, surely it's you!

rows.label: qst610501_msg0111
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst610501_msg0112
rows.name:
Ordinarily this would call for a
court martial, but if we can avoid
that, so much the better.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0113
rows.name:
It would not make me happy to
see a promising young soldier
removed from his station.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0114
rows.name:
And to tell the truth, I am
a little curious to see the
man's skills for myself.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0115
rows.name: Much obliged, ma'am.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0116
rows.name:
Like I said, you'll find him
over at Bathein Watchtower.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0117
rows.name:
But he's not friendly to folk
who try to get near, so you might
need to be a tad...forceful.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0118
rows.name:
Nothing you can't handle,
I'm sure, ma'am.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0119
rows.name: クエスト受注中

rows.label: qst610501_msg0201
rows.name:
You'll find Ishaq holed up
in Bathein Watchtower.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0202
rows.name:
He's not friendly to folk
who try to get close, so you
might need to use force.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0203
rows.name: Thanks so much for your help.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0123
rows.name: イスハクを倒した後

rows.label: qst610501_msg0124
rows.name: 帰還

rows.label: qst610501_msg0301
rows.name:
Ah, good to see you all! Did you
give that Ishaq a talking-to, then?

rows.label: qst610501_msg0126
rows.name: 説明

rows.label: qst610501_msg0302
rows.name: Well, that's a relief to hear.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0303
rows.name:
Of course, I'd expect no less
from Special Inquisitor Meleph
and her companions!

rows.label: qst610501_msg0304
rows.name:
Now I can finally get back
to commanding the rest of
my company in Temperantia!

rows.label: qst610501_msg0130
rows.name: 終了1

rows.label: qst610501_msg0305
rows.name:
Ah, beg pardon, but... Could I ask
you to go and check on that troublesome
Ishaq just one more time?

rows.label: qst610501_msg0306
rows.name:
I'm worried he might cause some
kind of fuss in Temperantia too.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0307
rows.name:
He's a skilled soldier, no doubt about
that, but he does have a knack for
grasping the wrong end of the stick.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0134
rows.name: 受注1

rows.label: qst610501_msg0308
rows.name:
You should find Ishaq guarding
the Divine Beast Weapon Dig
Site in Temperantia.

rows.label: qst610501_msg0309
rows.name:
I just need you to go and make sure
he's not getting up to anything.
